title: Cauliflower Crackers
description: These flourless crackers are Whole 30 compliant. No processed carbs!
directions: Steam cauliflower until you can mash it. 4 minutes in an Insta pot is good.
Add ghee and mash it up until it is like mashed potatoes.
Stir in Nutritional Yeast and flax meal.
Stir in Seeds. It should now be the consistency of a soft cookie dough.
Drop onto parchment lined cookie sheet by tablespoonful.
Cover with a sheet of wax paper and smash down each cracker until each is about 1/4 inch thick. Discard the wax paper. (It will be a sticky mess)
Salt the tops with coarse salt (from a grinder or kosher salt) and herbs of your choice. (I like Tanjine.)
Bake (convect bake if possible) at 300 until they start to get crisp--maybe 15 minutes.
Leave in hot oven for a couple of hours or overnight to crisp up.
If they're not crisp enough, bake for another few minutes and leave in hot oven again.
